
// the test bench and the machine code is below the code

addi x5, x0, 100
jal func
add x5, x2, x3
add x5, x5, x4
hlt
addi x6, x6, 34



func:
addi x2, x2, 10
add x3, x3, x2
and x4, x3, x3
jalr x0, x1, 0
addi x6, x6, 35


// the machine code of each instruction respectively

00101000000000011001000000010011 / 671191059 / 28019013
00000000000000000000001011101111 / 751 / 000002EF
00101000100001100000000000110011 / 679870515 / 28860033
00101001010010000000000000110011 / 692584499 / 29480033
00000000000000000000000001111111 / 127 / 0000007F
00110001100000001000100000010011 / 830507027 / 31808813
00010000100000000010100000010011 / 276834323 / 10802813
00011000110001000000000000110011 / 415498291 / 18C40033
00100000110001100000001110110011 / 549847987 / 20C603B3
00000000010000000000000001101011 / 4194411 / 0040006B
00110001100000001000110000010011 / 830508051 / 31808C13
PC1 = 0; Inst_to_wr = 32'h28019013; #2; 
PC1 = 1; Inst_to_wr = 32'h000002EF; #2; 
PC1 = 2; Inst_to_wr = 32'h28860033; #2; 
PC1 = 3; Inst_to_wr = 32'h29480033; #2; 
PC1 = 4; Inst_to_wr = 32'h0000007F; #2; 
PC1 = 5; Inst_to_wr = 32'h31808813; #2; 
PC1 = 6; Inst_to_wr = 32'h10802813; #2; 
PC1 = 7; Inst_to_wr = 32'h18C40033; #2; 
PC1 = 8; Inst_to_wr = 32'h20C603B3; #2; 
PC1 = 9; Inst_to_wr = 32'h0040006B; #2; 
PC1 = 10; Inst_to_wr = 32'h31808C13; #2;
